description:
Over 1600+ Students Benefited From This Course
- Many proven examples to follow to aid you in improving your decision making for your careers and business 
- and so much more.

=================

Are you looking to improve your business or career, learning these key wisdom knowledge by King Solomon whom attain more then $2.1 Trillion worth of gold. You will be able to learn his insights on what he recommends when it comes to making decisions for your business or careers.

At the end of this course, you will be able to make wiser and more ethical decisions in your careers and business by understanding the 30 Sayings written by King Solomon in the Book of Proverbs.

In this course, we will address lots of common issues we faced in our careers and business and King Solomon will give you good instructions and advice what you should do in situations that seems too hard to handle and the reason why.

To make this lesson easier to understand, examples are also been taught in each video to aid you to better understand the idea behind each teachings.
title: 30 Secrets of Solomon Wisdom in Proverbs
